characters: A person wearing a light-colored jacket and dark pants, possibly female, walking along the roadside.
summary: The video shows a vehicle driving on a rural two-lane road with mountains on either side. A person, appearing to be female, wearing a light-colored jacket and dark pants, is walking along the roadside on the right side of the road.  The person is initially visible at a distance and remains visible throughout the 4.7 seconds of the video. No sudden movements or actions that would indicate immediate danger are observed. The vehicle maintains a consistent speed and stays in its lane.
actions: The vehicle maintains a consistent speed and direction throughout the observed segment. There are no observable changes in speed or direction. The vehicle remains in its lane and does not overtake or change lanes.
key_objects: Right side: A person wearing a light-colored jacket and dark pants, approximately 15-20 meters away, walking along the roadside at a slow pace.  No immediate threat to the vehicle.
